Reviews.Title: Only One Week
Reviews.Author: JJP
Reviews.Content: We were going on vacation and my 2 girls ages 8 & 7 wanted cameras.  I didn't want to get them Fisher Price cameras as they seemed geared to younger children and the cameras seemed big.  I have had many cameras through the years and my older children have had cameras and we have never had a camera break so quickly.  We looked at reviews on Amazon.  This camera was our pick as several reviewers had purchased them for children.  (The fact that it is pink also helped.)  My 7 yr old's lens jammed after about 3 days and my 8 yr old dropped hers on about day 5.  I managed to get the lens unjammed but it wouldn't work and after only one drop on concrete the other one was dead.  My girls were so disappointed, they had so much fun taking pictures and videos.  My husband was not so happy either that they broke two brand new camera.  So, if you are buying these for children I would look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Polaroid i735 - Great little camera
Reviews.Author: L. Larson
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures but the batteries died very quickly (the batteries when tested said they were still good but they must need to be brand new to fully operate the camera).  We are trying rechargable batteries at the moment but other than spending more money for batteries than we would like, the camera is great.

Reviews.Title: Camera for all
Reviews.Author: L. V. Willrich Sr.
Reviews.Content: This little polaroid camera is ideal for that special lady who loves to snap photos everywhere she goes. The wife just loves it and carries it at all times. It's a very good buy.  L.V. Willrich Sr.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: hardwired
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy here, just a solid camera.  Purchased it for an 11 year, and it's been a hit!  A good choice for someone looking for a descent camera without spending a ton of money.

Reviews.Title: 13 year old
Reviews.Author: Diane R Haggard
Reviews.Content: Ive had this camera for about 2 or 3 years and it still works. it was left outside in the heavy rain with the clear cover on. And it still worked. but about a month later it fell on a twin bed with the lense out and on and now when ever i try to turn it on it makes this horriable buzzing sound. hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY IT!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Ellen
Reviews.Content: Bought three this past summer.  One for me and two were gifts; one to my 27 year old daughter, one to my 80 year old mom.  None of the cameras lasted more than a couple of months.  All three broke.  But they each had something different wrong with them.  The view finder screen on mine turned black on the second picture and froze, my daughter's camera wouldn't turn on after about three weeks (new batteries didn't help), my mother's camera worked longest - then the screen turned blue.The cameras weren't mistreated they just are pieces of garbage that never should have been sold at any price.  The one I kept for myself took exactly two pictures and then the camera froze never to be used again.  DO NOT BUY IT!!!!Polaroid i735 7 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.5-inch LCD

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: P. Julian
Reviews.Content: it was a present for my 10 year old and It's easy to use. she like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUT UNLESS YOU WANT TO BUY NEW BATTERIES EVERYDAY
Reviews.Author: K. S. Lutz "killerpenguiinX"
Reviews.Content: Although this camera is very pleasant to the eye and takes decent pictures, it is not worth it unless you are willing to buy new batteries everyday. I have had this camera for a few months now and the battery power keeps getting worse and worse. Now i can take about 5 pictures before my brand new battery is already half way empty and by the 10th picture it shuts off on its own. Sometimes if i wait about ten minutes and turn it back on i can take about 5 more pictures before the battery dies again. It is not worth the aggravation. I tried rechargeable batteries as well but i do not have time to sit and wait a hour just to take ten pics and have the camera die on me again. Save your money and buy a camera that does not suck batteries dry every 10 minutes!

Reviews.Title: So awesome that we have 2!
Reviews.Author: D. Jackson "WriterMom"
Reviews.Content: I got my daughter one of those overpriced kids cameras by VTECH and when 2 of them did not work, I got on Amazon in January and found a "real" camera with a comparable price. My super expensive slim Nikon I had took a spill and stopped working, so I got online and ordered another one of these in the interim. Of course it is slower than the camera I had before, but the pics turn out great and the 7 mp are good enough. Who needs a 10 anyway? Unless they are a pro. But, I don't know if I am going to rush to get the Nikon fixed b/c I am satisfied with this one for now. When we got hers in January it came with a camera case. When I got mine in July mine came with a clear snug sleeve that keeps it from getting wet or damaged. I thought that that was neat.Only complaint, is that it is slow when my daughter is moving-which is all of the time, the pic can sometimes blur. But, that is to be expected for the price range of the camera. You really have to spend quite a lot to get cameras that can take quick action shots.PS Quite chunky and durable which makes it great for a kid. I don't think that if it fell it would damage it as easily as the slim ones that are en vogue now. Also, the fun color appeals to little girls.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price!
Reviews.Author: Leonardo
Reviews.Content: Highly recommended is a good product at a price. It has many functions and picture quality is good. It has a decent video in AVI format.If you want a good camera at a great price, buy it.

ProductInfo.Features:
7.0 megapixels captures enough detail for photo-quality 14 x 19-inch prints
3x Optical Zoom And  4x Digital Zoom
High-resolution 2.5-inch TFT LCD screen for bright, accurate color and wide viewing angle
16 MB internal memory: Captures images to SD memory cards (not included)
Power Supply: 2 AA alkaline battery, NiMH or NiCd rechargeable battery
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid i735 - Digital camera - compact - 7.0 Mpix - optical zoom: 3 x - supported memory: MMC, SD
